name: Tut Tut
description:
Tut tut is a visual sequencer made for Global Game jam 2018,

Use your mouse to put down notes and make a sweet tune for you ears, you can move notes around, modify the pitch and change samples using the UP and DOWN arrows. 

I was a site organizer and didn't have the time to push it further but here's a liste of incoming features : 

   - choosing the speed

   - importing your own samples

   - saving loops for later use

   - interface to compose a song with your saved tunes

   - exporting .wav files to listen to your cool songs 

   - basically FL studio with cute graphics

I hope you'l like it, it's a simple thing made with love <3
